clean_data:
FATIMA ELSHEIKH
Odoo Project Manager | Senior Odoo Functional | Senior BA
 
9384                          UAE
SUMMARY
Demonstrated experience in delivering over 15 projects, requirements 
management and processes , accompanying the customer in project 
implementation through its whole life cycle, delivering with a high quality
and ensuring customer's satisfaction, Strong technical knowledge and 
excellent interpersonal communication  skills enable me to interact with 
a wide range of clients. Always  eager to learn, grow and improve my 
skills, and I believe I'll be a great addition to your company which is an 
important asset to reach  my full potential
EXPERIENCE
Project Manager , Canyons Business Solutions,Feb 2023-present  
- Led a team of [2] developers, functional consultants, and testers in the 
successful implementation of multiple Odoo projects.
- Developed project plans, timelines, and ensured timely delivery within 
allocated resources.
- Collaborated with clients to define project requirements, conducted 
gap analysis, and designed optimal solutions.
- Managed customization and configurations of Odoo modules to meet 
specific business needs.
- Conducted end-user training sessions and provided post-
implementation support and maintenance.
- Monitored project progress, identified risks, and implemented 
mitigation strategies.
- Maintained strong relationships with clients, ensuring high levels of 
customer satisfaction.
- Managed client change requests, ensuring proper prioritization and 
impact assessment.
- Conducted regular project status meetings with clients and internal 
stakeholders.
 - Prepared comprehensive project documentation, including functional 
and technical specifications. Senior Odoo Functional BA , IATL-Intellisoft, Oct 2020-Jan2023
- Collaborated with clients to understand their business processes and 
requirements
- Conducted workshops and interviews to gather necessary information 
for system implementation
- Gap analysis performance and transformation analysis into detailed 
requirement recorded in product backlog.
- Create and maintain comprehensive business requirements 
specifications documents 
- Development aspect follow up with the technical team.
- Conducted user training sessions on how to effectively use the Odoo 
system
- Provided ongoing support and troubleshooting assistance post go-live  
Odoo Implementation
- Responsible for conducting demo sessions, key users training 
sessions.
- Designed functional solutions by configuring Odoo modules according 
to client needs
Senior Odoo Functional BA , IATL International, July2020-Sep2020 
Online Odoo Trainer ,Freelancer , April2020-June2020 
Odoo software developer ,Think Tank, Sep 2018 April 2020 
Software developer,Oxygen ICT ,August 2017-August2018
EDUCATION
MBA, University of Garden city,  Khartoum ,2023
High diploma of Business Administration , Sudan International  
University, Khartoum ,2021
 Master Computer Science-Software      Engineering, Future University,  
Khartoum 2018
Bachelor Information System and  Network, Sudan University of Science
and Technology,  Khartoum 2015
Certifications - Odoo Functional V14.0
- Business Analysis & Process Management,  Coursera.
- Business Analysis, from Zafar Training Center.
- Project Management Processional (PMP), From Developers Point 
center.
Skills
- Odoo ERP Implementation – Team Management – Multi Tasking -
Communication Skills -  Leadership – Teamwork – Documentation 
Project Management - Requirements Gathering - Business Process 
Analysis - System Design and Customization - Testing- Training and 
Support - Stakeholder Management
Additional Information
Linkedin :   
My odoo channel : 
References
Available upon request
